page.title: 12The Agricultural Institute
page.content: At one stage during its development Chadacre ran summer courses for women and girls,but more recently short res- identalÂ£block'courses for farmers and workers of either sex have have been provided.These latter are run in con- junction with the Suffolk Education Committee as part of a comprehensive system of part-time day and evening courses.A modern,well equipped teach- ing building-the Farm Training Centre -has been built by the Education Comm- ittee at Chadacre and is run jointly with the Institute. Sporting facilities include a well fitted sports hall,a small outdoor swimming pool,cricket pitch, long jump pit, and rugby and football pitches.
